_header: Old and young that here be
Subjects: Margaret, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: The Life of St. Margaret (later version)

BodAsh61.First Lines:
Old & ȝong þat here belystyns A whyle vnto
                    meWhat I schall ȝou seyHow it be fell vpon a
                    dey…
BodAsh61.Last Lines:
…pray we All þat may so beAmen Amen for
                    charyte
BodAsh61.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 236-41.
Shuffleton,  George. 
             Ashmole 61: A Compilation of Popular Middle English Verse.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008: 372-85; 569-75; 625.

YaleBei365.First Lines:
O Olde & yowng þat ben herelystyn and to me
                    clare…
YaleBei365.Last Lines:
…In thys lekenes sente to þe vsffor to stroye thy fayre
                    bodyWith hys crafte of negramency
YaleBei365.Editions:
Smith,  Lucy Toulmin,
                        ed.  
             A Commonplace Book of the Fifteenth Century.
         Norwich: Kerrison, Goose, 1886: 107-18.
